purpose: Provide a comprehensive survey and analysis of Artificial General Intelligence (AGI) research and developments.
principle: Aggregates and synthesizes data from various AGI research papers and sources to present a cohesive overview of the field.
reusability: Includes Jupyter Notebooks that can be reused or adapted for further research analysis and educational purposes.
limitations: Primarily focused on AGI research; may not cover all aspects or recent developments comprehensively.
name: AGI-survey
